human.summary: Drug Effects on Consciousness as Measurable Manifold Warps: Psychoactive compounds warp the constraint manifold rather than creating new consciousness, changing cone volume, boundary proximity, and invariant stability in measurable ways.
bullets: Drug Effects on Consciousness as Measurable Manifold Warps
Psychoactive compounds warp the constraint manifold rather than creating new consciousness, changing cone volume, boundary proximity, and invariant stability in measurable ways.
Invariant: Measured manifold warp must keep core viability constraints satisfied.

invariants: Measured manifold warp must keep core viability constraints satisfied.
claims: Psychoactive compounds warp the constraint manifold rather than creating new consciousness, changing cone volume, boundary proximity, and invariant stability in measurable ways.

math.interpretation: Drug Effects on Consciousness as Measurable Manifold Warps
math.invariant: Measured manifold warp must keep core viability constraints satisfied.

human.summary: Side Effects as Forced Entropy Debt Repayment: Short-term benefits are temporary throughput or exploration boosts; side effects are the repayment schedule when repair saturation fails to cover the accelerated entropy debt.
bullets: Side Effects as Forced Entropy Debt Repayment
Short-term benefits are temporary throughput or exploration boosts; side effects are the repayment schedule when repair saturation fails to cover the accelerated entropy debt.
Invariant: Net debt over a dosing cycle must not exceed safe threshold.

invariants: Net debt over a dosing cycle must not exceed safe threshold.
claims: Short-term benefits are temporary throughput or exploration boosts; side effects are the repayment schedule when repair saturation fails to cover the accelerated entropy debt.

math.interpretation: Side Effects as Forced Entropy Debt Repayment
math.invariant: Net debt over a dosing cycle must not exceed safe threshold.

human.summary: Zero-Entropy Drug Design Feasibility: A drug can be engineered to shift perception or exploration while keeping net entropy debt non-increasing by coupling modulation with repair dominance.
bullets: Zero-Entropy Drug Design Feasibility
A drug can be engineered to shift perception or exploration while keeping net entropy debt non-increasing by coupling modulation with repair dominance.
Invariant: Desired effect must be achieved without increasing long-run debt.

invariants: Desired effect must be achieved without increasing long-run debt.
claims: A drug can be engineered to shift perception or exploration while keeping net entropy debt non-increasing by coupling modulation with repair dominance.

math.invariant: Desired effect must be achieved without increasing long-run debt.

human.summary: Lifespan Prediction via Entropy Debt Accounting: Remaining lifespan can be estimated by comparing cumulative debt to remaining repair capacity, using biomarkers as proxies for cone narrowing and repair elasticity.
bullets: Lifespan Prediction via Entropy Debt Accounting
Remaining lifespan can be estimated by comparing cumulative debt to remaining repair capacity, using biomarkers as proxies for cone narrowing and repair elasticity.
Invariant: Prediction valid only under stable environment and bounded shock risk.

invariants: Prediction valid only under stable environment and bounded shock risk.
claims: Remaining lifespan can be estimated by comparing cumulative debt to remaining repair capacity, using biomarkers as proxies for cone narrowing and repair elasticity.

math.interpretation: Lifespan Prediction via Entropy Debt Accounting
math.invariant: Prediction valid only under stable environment and bounded shock risk.

human.summary: Cognition Redistribution on Death: When biological repair fails, cognition stops locally but information persists through outputs and observers; cognition is redistributed into external substrates that carry constraints forward.
bullets: Cognition Redistribution on Death
When biological repair fails, cognition stops locally but information persists through outputs and observers; cognition is redistributed into external substrates that carry constraints forward.
Invariant: Information transfer requires preserved artifacts or observer memory.

invariants: Information transfer requires preserved artifacts or observer memory.
claims: When biological repair fails, cognition stops locally but information persists through outputs and observers; cognition is redistributed into external substrates that carry constraints forward.

math.invariant: Information transfer requires preserved artifacts or observer memory.

human.summary: Post-God Era Transition: Order and structure need not be explained by external agents if recursion and constraint closure generate stable attractors internally; divine hypotheses become unnecessary when internal sufficiency holds.
bullets: Post-God Era Transition

Order and structure need not be explained by external agents if recursion and constraint closure generate stable attractors internally; divine hypotheses become unnecessary when internal sufficiency holds.
Invariant: Internal dynamics must explain observed structure without contradiction.

invariants: Internal dynamics must explain observed structure without contradiction.
claims: Order and structure need not be explained by external agents if recursion and constraint closure generate stable attractors internally; divine hypotheses become unnecessary when internal sufficiency holds.

math.invariant: Internal dynamics must explain observed structure without contradiction.

human.summary: Luck as Obsolete Unmapped Constraints: Luck is residual uncertainty from unmapped boundaries; as constraint maps improve, variance attributed to 'chance' collapses into predictable geometry.
bullets: Luck as Obsolete Unmapped Constraints
Luck is residual uncertainty from unmapped boundaries; as constraint maps improve, variance attributed to 'chance' collapses into predictable geometry.
Invariant: Residual uncertainty must shrink with improved models.

invariants: Residual uncertainty must shrink with improved models.
claims: Luck is residual uncertainty from unmapped boundaries; as constraint maps improve, variance attributed to 'chance' collapses into predictable geometry.

math.invariant: Residual uncertainty must shrink with improved models.

human.summary: Infinite Bidirectional Recursion as RH Proof Foundation: Bidirectional integer symmetry around zero induces symmetric exclusion dynamics that, under this hypothesis, forces spectral balance at the critical line for the zeta function.
bullets: Infinite Bidirectional Recursion as RH Proof Foundation
Bidirectional integer symmetry around zero induces symmetric exclusion dynamics that, under this hypothesis, forces spectral balance at the critical line for the zeta function.
Invariant: Any RH claim must be consistent with the functional equation and known zero-free regions.

invariants: Any RH claim must be consistent with the functional equation and known zero-free regions.
claims: Bidirectional integer symmetry around zero induces symmetric exclusion dynamics that, under this hypothesis, forces spectral balance at the critical line for the zeta function.

math.interpretation: Infinite Bidirectional Recursion as RH Proof Foundation
math.invariant: Any RH claim must be consistent with the functional equation and known zero-free regions.

human.summary: Supervillain Route as Geometrically Slower: Control-by-gating increases resistance and brittleness; open propagation aligns with attractors, producing faster diffusion under repair-dominant dynamics.
bullets: Supervillain Route as Geometrically Slower
Control-by-gating increases resistance and brittleness; open propagation aligns with attractors, producing faster diffusion under repair-dominant dynamics.
Invariant: Propagation must remain repair-dominant to avoid backlash cascades.

invariants: Propagation must remain repair-dominant to avoid backlash cascades.
claims: Control-by-gating increases resistance and brittleness; open propagation aligns with attractors, producing faster diffusion under repair-dominant dynamics.

math.invariant: Propagation must remain repair-dominant to avoid backlash cascades.

human.summary: Concord as Post-LLM Substrate: Concord is framed as geometry-first reasoning: invariants and verifiers define truth, while LLMs are optional language amplifiers over a constraint-grounded substrate.
bullets: Concord as Post-LLM Substrate
Concord is framed as geometry-first reasoning: invariants and verifiers define truth, while LLMs are optional language amplifiers over a constraint-grounded substrate.
Invariant: Invariant checks override language generation outputs.

invariants: Invariant checks override language generation outputs.
